EmailSenderSettings.NewMessageNotificationTemplate: You have new message {3} from {0} in rental #{1}. To read this open this link.
EmailSenderSettings.NewRobotMessageTemplate: Congratulations! In our system we have the robot - {0} that have been recently added and it matches with your interests. You can find it by clicking on this link.

EmailSenderSettings.AutomaticallyCloseRentMessageTemplate: Your rent #{0} was automatically completed due to end date of rent. You can find it by clicking on this link.
EmailSenderSettings.AutomaticallyCloseRentMessageSubject: RLS - Your rent was automatically completed.
EmailSenderSettings.ReturnRobotMessageTemplate: Your rent #{0} will complete in {2} hour(s), please return robot on time. You can find it by clicking on this link.
EmailSenderSettings.ReturnRobotMessageSubject: RLS - Return you robot on time.
